profileAlternative.name: Biyue Huang
profileAlternative.headline: Data Scientist
profileAlternative.summary:
Graduated with a Master's degree in Statistics from Columbia University, I am fascinated by the opportunities to apply data science techniques to translate data into meaningful business results.

Currently working in the technology industry, I have extensive experiences in identifying business problems and provide practical solutions with quantitative approaches. I am always passionate about adapting myself to the most advanced technology.

► Tools:
Python (Numpy, Pandas, Matplotlib, Seaborn, Scipy, sklearn, Tensorflow), R, SQL, SAS, Git, GitHub, Spark

► Skills:
Machine Learning, Quantitative Research, Deep Learning, Reinforcement Learning, Data Mining, A/B Testing, Statistical Analysis, Data Visualisation, Data Analysis, Product Metrics, Analytics, Predictive Modeling
